input.sentences: i went to the library yesterday .
they had a lot of new books .
there were some information boards posted .
i stayed there for a while .
eventually all my friends showed up .
output.sentences: I enjoy going to the library.
There is always a lot of things to discover and learn there.
I noticed that there was a poster for an upcoming seminar.
I decided to stay and listen to the seminar.
In the end lots of people sat in to listen and the presenter gave a great speech.
